summary: Trapped in Puerto Rico, a beautiful young Swede is torn between her passionate, but mildly abusive Caribbean oligarch husband and her longing for her European homeland.
cast: Zarah Leander|Ferdinand Marian|Karl Martell|Julia Serda|Boris Alekin|Paul Bildt|Edwin Jürgensen|Carl Kuhlmann|Michael Schulz-Dornburg|Rosita Alcaraz|Lisa Helwig|Géza Földessy|Franz Arzdorf|Roma Bahn|Günther Ballier|Bob Bauer|Louis Brody|Werner Finck|Karl Hannemann|Harry Hardt|Max Hiller|Werner Kepich|Hans Kettler|Carl Merznicht|Ernst Rotmund|Werner Scharf|Hasso Sherief-Osmann|Franz Stein|Max Wilhelm
title: La Habanera
